item.description:
My two boys are three and oneÂ  and we would like to host Weekly playdates on Mondays. We have a fenced in backyard and a finished basement that the kids can play in. On some nice days we can visit the nearby park & pond with nice sandy beach. So come over and have some fun!

Note: the playdate has been changed to 1pm instead of 10am. My older son has morning preschool this Fall so we need to do it after he gets out.
item.name: Backyard Fun Monday Playdates
